name: Super Rush 2: Love Gold Master
description:
Brand-new world, There are four new playable character, mushrooms, hedgehogs, spiders, crabs, and fire breathing dragon, so many monsters waiting for you to challenge.

Be a Super Rush Hit 2!
Unleash the power of your fists, weapons and spells in this pattern-based adventure.
Hone your reflexes and be one with the environment as speed and rhythm become second-nature.
Play with powerful heroes and unlock all their abilities and secrets to help better dispense your foes.
Reach new and faraway lands not yet discovered by fellow travelers.

- 80 different Levels allow you to choose
- Become a master of speed and rhythm
- 4 Characters with unique and powerful abilities to unlock
- Battle your way through new and dangerous lands
- Game center support
